alert.note: Alert for Amite; Pike; Walthall; Wilkinson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued March 11 at 2:57PM CST until March 13 at 9:00AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 PM CST SATURDAY... ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM CST SATURDAY TO 10 AM CDT SUNDAY... ...FREEZE WARNING FOR TONIGHT IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, temperatures below 32 degrees expected with most locations forecast to see temperatures between 25 and 30 degrees. For the Wind Advisory, north winds 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph expected. * WHERE...Wilkinson, Amite, Pike and Walthall Counties. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, from 9 PM CST Saturday to 10 AM CDT Sunday. For the Wind Advisory, from 8 PM this evening to 3 PM CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
